DOC.brief_summary: This is a biomedical research, prospective, mono centric, tolerance study Of the administration of subcutaneous teicoplanin in the treatment of osteoarticular infections.
DOC.brief_title: Administration of Subcutaneous Teicoplanin in the Treatment of Osteoarticular Infections: Tolerance Study
